### Reproducible document generation

To test reproducible document generation:

1.  Start [RStudio](http://www.rstudio.com/)
2.  Open a new Rmarkdown (.html) file
3.  Convert that .html file with the 'knit' button
4.  Modify the .html file and knit it again to make your own
    reproducible report
